entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain mixed with drizzle near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
